name: CurlyHop
description:
Top-Down arcade game about Curly, a girl trapped in a misterous dungeon making her way out by smashing enemies and launching them at each other!

Controls

WASD, Arrows or Gamepad Joystick to move character

Space Bar or Gamepad A button to jump and press again on mid air to smash.

Esc or Gamepad Start to pause game.

Game created by:

Rocío (@ftalocianina)

David (@davidpixel)

Music by jdfr03

Please leave a comment if there are any problems. Thanks!

Update (11-11-17): Added How To Play menu and fixed particle systems related bugs.

Update(28-11-2017): Added installer download.
